text:
It turns out, Jennifer Lopez‘s daughter Emme is her mini-me in more ways than one! The proud mama shared a video to Instagram on Thursday, Dec. 14, showing the nine-year-old — whose dad is Marc Anthony — singing in what’s believed to be her school’s 2017 Christmas pageant. Watch the adorable clip below!

Needless to say, fans went crazy over the video, which also highlights Emme’s personality. In the short clip, she lip-syncs the lead singer’s lines (like her mom, she’s not destined for backup vocals!) and flashes a big smile at the camera. “Aww, to be blessed with jlo genes. So pretty,” one follower wrote, while another added, “Emme is so gorgeous!!” Her twin brother Max previously revealed on The Ellen DeGeneres Show that he’s also a singer.

A few months ago, J.Lo’s boyfriend, Alex Rodriguez, shared a video of the Grammy nominee coaching his daughter Ella through a vocal lesson. The nine-year-old sang along to Alessia Cara’s “Scars to Your Beautiful” while the Shades of Blue actress helped her with pitch. It looks like everything the brunette beauty touches turns to musical gold!
title: Jennifer Lopez’s Daughter Shows off Her Singing Skills on Instagram!
